attributes.action: We the tax payers of England want the government to take in more Syrian children
attributes.additional_details: Just watch the news to see it your self!
attributes.background: Syria is being bombarded. Families are torn apart. Parents are left dead under the remains of the rubble. Children have stopped crying: parents are mourning over their murdered children.What are you the government going to do? We the UK are part of the UN ; what are you going to do?
